hero.title: Your Intelligent AI Assistant
hero.subtitle: Experience the future of conversation with our advanced AI chatbot. Get instant answers, personalized assistance, and seamless interactions.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for intelligent conversations

feature1.title: 24/7 Availability
feature1.description: Get instant responses anytime, anywhere. Our AI never sleeps.

feature2.title: Multi-Language Support
feature2.description: Communicate in your preferred language with seamless translation.

feature3.title: Smart Context Understanding
feature3.description: Advanced AI that understands context and provides relevant answers.

feature4.title: Secure & Private
feature4.description: Your conversations are encrypted and your privacy is our priority.

feature5.title: Personalized Experience
feature5.description: AI learns from your preferences to provide tailored responses.

feature6.title: Fast & Efficient
feature6.description: Lightning-fast responses powered by cutting-edge technology.

about.title: About Our Platform
about.subtitle: Building the future of AI-powered communication
about.description: We are dedicated to creating intelligent solutions that enhance human-AI interaction. Our chatbot leverages state-of-the-art natural language processing to understand and respond to your needs with unprecedented accuracy and efficiency.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make AI accessible and beneficial for everyone through intuitive and powerful conversational interfaces.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where AI seamlessly integrates into daily life, empowering people with instant knowledge and assistance.

industryLeading.title: Industry Leading
industryLeading.description: Recognized for excellence in AI innovation

users.title: 100K+ Users
users.description: Trusted by individuals and businesses worldwide

signIn.title: Sign In
signIn.subtitle: Welcome back! Sign in to continue
signIn.description: Enter your credentials to access your account

signUp.title: Create Account
signUp.subtitle: Create your account to get started
signUp.description: Sign up to start chatting with our AI assistant

emptyState.title: Start a New Conversation
emptyState.description: Select a chat from the sidebar or create a new one
